com.tradersgem2.lists

Class Portfolio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tradersgem2.lists.StockList
      • com.tradersgem2.lists.Portfolio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable, java.util.Collection, java.util.List

    public class Portfolio
extends StockList
    The subClass Portfolio extends the StockList. This class is the junction between the models that manage the storage of the stocks and the view which will display the stock; The class ListView, that will display all the sublists of StockList, will be getting the information from this list;
    Author:
    Luiz
